We were at La Boqueria on La Rambla and starving so skipped the wait at the highly recommended El Quim (yelp.com/biz/el-quim-de-…) and found Bar Clemens in the back left corner of the market, if you're entering from La Rambla.Tasty and cheap breakfast items and pretty decent coffee (yelp.com/biz_photos/_cuP…). You can see my pictures of the menu as well as skewers ready to grill in their cold case.In the Boqueria website they list their specialties as    - Desayunos (breakfast)    - Bocadillos frios y calientes (hot & cold sandwiches)    - Aperitivos (snacks)    - Tapas
